picard.util

Class MetricsDoclet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.tools.doclets.standard.Standard
      • picard.util.MetricsDoclet

  • public class MetricsDoclet
extends com.sun.tools.doclets.standard.Standard
    Doclet for use with JavaDoc that will find all classes extending MetricBase and output information about the metrics definitions that go along with the classes.

    Takes a single parameter (-f file) to tell it where to output the resulting documentation file in HTML format.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static boolean start(com.sun.javadoc.RootDoc root)
        Entry point called by the javadoc command line tool. Loops over all the classes identifying metrics classes and then produces some basic information about each in a single HTML file.
        Parameters:
        root - the root of the javadoc object hierarchy
        Returns:
        true if completed successfully, false otherwise

      • isMetricsClass

        protected static boolean isMetricsClass(com.sun.javadoc.ClassDoc doc)
        Checks to see if the class extends MetricBase using only the JavaDoc metadata provided about the class.
        Parameters:
        doc - the ClassDoc representing the class to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the class is a metrics class, false otherwise

      • getOutput

        protected static java.io.PrintStream getOutput(com.sun.javadoc.RootDoc root)
        Gets the file output parameter from the RootDoc and then opens an PrintStream to write to the file.

      • firstSentence

        protected static java.lang.String firstSentence(com.sun.javadoc.Doc doc)
        Takes a Doc object and uses the firstSentenceTags() to recreate the first sentence text.
